        <div id="ctl00_main_body_block_internationalhome_text_text" dir="ltr" style="text-align:left;"><br />
<h3>Welcome to Big Bus Tours</h3>
<p>Your Big Bus sightseeing tour is created around a thoughtfully designed route that takes you to key places of interest and our hop-on, hop-off facility lets you discover them.</p>
<p>Our open-top bus tours provide an informative and entertaining commentary, so you can get to know the history of the city, as well as discovering local insights. </p>
<p>Whichever city you're visiting, from London to New York, our hop-on, hop-off bus tours are tailored to showcase all that's unique about that particular city, including buildings, monuments, landmarks and famous attractions. </p><p>For many of our cities, we also provide extras such as river cruises and free museum entry to enhance your sightseeing experience. Get an excellent introduction to the city and enjoy a fun day out with Big Bus Tours. &nbsp;</p></div>
